name: Nɪɴᴊᴀ Iꜱʟᴀɴᴅ
description:
Nɪɴᴊᴀ Iꜱʟᴀɴᴅ | ᴏꜰꜰɪᴄɪᴀʟ ꜱᴇʀɪᴇꜱ =======  Download Below All the Game Parts!! Right now, there are 5 Parts! Download them below!  Parts: Magic Island (1),  Crystal Cavers (2), Volcanic Temple (3), Aqua Mountains (4), Desert Paradise (5) ======= 

You were having fun with your friends, family... until...the evil ninjas kidnapped them. You were the only Ninja which survived. Even, the Evil Ninjas kidnapped the Gold Master Ninja... the current king of the Ninja Island. Save them! You are the only one which can save them! Crystal Caverns are awesome! The crystals look epic... But not everything was as easy as it seemed... Now, the Evil Ninja King's castle is in the Crystal Cavers. But what happened? What will happen next? Now you're in the Volcanic Temple! Wait, you have a sword! Now, in the Aqua Mountains! All the Best Ninjas became best ninjas in the Aqua Mountains... find the 5 Gems! Today you'll find the Water Gem! Today... In Desert Paradise... The Water Gem gave you the power to fly, and today you'll find the Desert Gem! Remember, the gems give you powers so in the final part you can beat evil ninjas and rescue your family! 

=======  ~ Instructions ~ 

> Move with AWD, arrows or mobile friendly controls! 

> Don't touch spikes, enemies. 

> Avoid falling and avoid lava! 

> Go until the end, and never give up!

 =======  ~ Credits ~

=======  ~ Ninja Quotes ~

"Ninjas Never give up and Ninjas never will" - The Gold Master Ninja 

"All Ninjas have a talent, and to find it you have to work hard" 

"Ninjas will exist forever and ever"

 "All Ninjas are the same, not some Ninjas are better than others" "Everything is possible for the Ninjas"
